communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

This is a request for a mandatory declassification review (MDR), under the terms of section 3.5 of E.O. 13526, for the following:

Materials discussing the targeting of the late Russian Federation mercenary leader Yevgeniy Viktorovich Prigozhin for any military operation. This includes material from any point in the targeting cycle, such as nomination, development, vetting, validation, or list management, where Prigozhin was specified as a target. It may include his targeting for lethal force (such as airstrike) or nonlethal force (such as cyberspace operation). 

The U.S. Treasury identifies Prigozhin with the following identifying information: DOB 01 Jun 1961; POB Leningrad.

I request the release of all reasonably segregable material.

T. McElwee
